title: Health Cluster Response in the occupied Palestinian territory
subtitle: Over the past year, over 2.5 million people have benefited from the Health Cluster partners' response activities.

title: Gaza Polio Response 2024
subtitle: Since polio was confirmed in Gaza in July 2024, the Ministry of Health, WHO, and partners have led coordinated efforts.

title: WHO: Guardian of Health
subtitle: Health is essential for people to reach their full potential. The WHO works to make sure everyone has access to health care.

title: The WHO explained (explainityÂ® explainer video)
subtitle: A better healthier future for all the people worldwide. This is the proclaimed goal of the World Health Organization.

title: The World Health Organization: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (HBO)
subtitle: John Oliver discusses the crucial role of the World Health Organization, its relationship with Donald Trump, and more.

title: WHO: Health care without avoidable infections - peoples' lives depend on it
subtitle: No health system can claim to be free of avoidable infections. These infections are acquired through health care practices.

title: WHO: The Power of Health Workers
subtitle: Health workers are more powerful than you think. They help people recover and play a key role in global health.

title: WHO: Bringing health to life
subtitle: The World Health Organization drives global health initiatives that impact all lives, no matter where we are.

title: Towards making every city a healthy city
subtitle: Urban health challenges in the WHO Eastern Mediterranean Region are increasingly complex and need more attention.

title: WHO: What is antimicrobial resistance (AMR)?
subtitle: Dr. Marie-Paule Kieny and Dr. Keiji Fukuda explain antimicrobial resistance and its impact on global health.

title: What is the World Health Organization?
subtitle: The World Health Organization is in the spotlight for leading the fight against the new coronavirus and its impact on health worldwide.
